input.sentences: we had to stop and look at the huge `` cheese on a stick '' sign .
just look at all the little adorable stuffed animals !
the best part is when you turn upside down !
there were so many people gathered it was hard to find anyone .
this might have been the coolest thing i have ever seen !
output.sentences: The beer battered cheese on a stick likely gave customers the runs.
The amusement park prizes looked like they were made in China.
The ride at the amusement park glowed in the night.
